summary: They’re much, much stupider — investing is like that
title: NFTs Aren’t As Stupid As You Think
detailed_content: Last week I was in rural Arizona, and in the course of business I met two of the older guys in town. One of them owns and operates the motel, which most likely exists because if you drive a truck from the Port of Los Angeles for a regulation-limit 11 hour day, right around here is where you end up. The other one…
author: Mikey Dickerson
